mapper.select: SELECT c.*, l.*,t.* from courses c , levels l, teachers t WHERE c.id=#{id} and c.id_level = l.id and c.id_teacher=t.id
SELECT c.*, l.*,t.* from courses c , levels l, teachers t WHERE c.id_level = l.id and c.id_teacher=t.id
